thread.title: Hotel staff very friendly. Great for first time vist.
thread.title_full: Hotel staff very friendly. Great for first time vist. - Review of Cambria hotel & suites New York - Chelsea, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Julia O
title: Hotel staff very friendly. Great for first time vist.
text: I would stay here again. Considering this was our first time to NYC I did not know what to expect. I appreciated the staff hospitality especially housekeeping. Although the hotel does not have the city views it was in a good location. Walkable to Penn Station and Empire State building. There was access to the subway on both sides of the hotel. Room was modern and a good size for a couple. Would recommend this to friends and family.
